description:
Design an extensible plugin system where new entity types (beyond persons, engagements, forums, etc.) can be added without modifying core code. Include hooks for validation, relationships, permissions, and UI rendering.

**Rationale:** The system manages many entity types with similar patterns. A plugin architecture reduces code duplication, makes adding new entity types trivial, improves testability through isolation, and allows customer-specific entity types without forking the codebase.
title: Build a Plugin Architecture for Entity Types
